text:
So, which technologies
will drive your transformation?

A modern business model is dynamic,
data-driven, and automated.

To support this model, new advanced
technologies such as cloud,

artificial intelligence,
Internet of Things, and predictive

analytics work together
to support new business
cases.

The cloud drives rapid 
experimentation through the
pay-as-you-go model

and empowers you to try more
ideas at a lower cost.

If successful, you can scale
the solutions rapidly.

If unsuccessful, you can immediately
eliminate further spending.

With the cloud, you can focus
on your customers, not on data
centers.

You can concentrate on the projects
that differentiate

your business for your customers,
rather than investing time and

money on racking, stacking,
and powering servers.

IDC estimates that application
development teams that have

moved to the cloud are 25 percent
more productive, and that implementing

new capabilities such as storage
takes 90 percent less time to
deploy.

They also report that organizations
that shift to cloud experience

94 percent less time lost due
to unplanned downtime and realize

a 14 percent increase in business
user productivity.

There is a lot to learn with
the cloud and digital transformation.

Often, we find organizations
struggling to determine

the right services, tools,
and approaches that can help
address their problems.
Don't go at it alone.

While you should be careful
not to outsource what differentiates

you, it is still advisable
to bring in a technology

partner who has experience
in the area in which you are
working to help get you started.

For more information
on this topic, check out the
links in the description.
Thanks for watching!
